Der viel zu frhe Tod von Charly Lamm hat uns alle sehr getroffen. Charly war immer einer der Menschen gegen den wir gerne angetreten sind und dem man seine groartigen Erfolge von Herzen gegnnt hat. Wir werden seine herzliche und immer freundliche Art sehr vermissen. Wir wnschen der Familie Lamm viel Kraft in dieser schweren Zeit.Uli Fritz / CEO HWA AG#SadDay #RIPCharly #Friend

DTM-Saisonfinale: JETZT TICKETS GEWINNEN Das DTM-Saisonfinale steigt auf dem Hockenheimring und wir verlosen 2 x 2 Tickets fr das Event am 13./14. Oktober 2018 inklusive Zugang zum Fahrerlager! Gewinne mit etwas Glck zwei Tickets und sei live vor Ort dabei, wenn der Kampf um die Meisterschaft entschieden wird.Und so kannst du am Gewinnspiel teilnehmen:1. Like die Instagram-Seite der HWA AG.2. Like den Gewinnspiel-Post.3. Schicke uns eine Nachricht ber Instagram und verrate uns, wie viele Mercedes-AMG C 63 DTM am Wochenende starten werden. 4. Verrate uns in den Kommentaren, mit wem du das Rennen besuchen mchtest. Unter allen richtigen Einsendungen verlosen wir insgesamt zwei mal zwei Tickets fr das DTM-Saisonfinale auf dem Hockenheimring inklusive Zugang zum Fahrerlager. Anreise, Unterkunft und Verpflegung sind nicht Gegenstand der Verlosung. Teilnahmeschluss ist Dienstag, der 9. Oktober um 23:59 Uhr. Die Gewinner werden anschlieend ausgelost und ber die Instagram-Seite der HWA AG kontaktiert. Viel Erfolg!Teilnahmebedingungen: https://hwaag.com/de/gewinnspielinstagramTickets: https://www.dtm.com/de/tickets-2018 Web: https://www.hwaag.com/ #HWA #HWAAG #WinTickets #Gewinnspiel #Verlosung #DTM #motorsport #racing #speed #mercedes #amg #MercedesAMG #teamspirit #teamwork #engineering #affalterbach #hightech #challenge #team #mercedesbenz #sport #work #hockenheimring @dtm_pics @hockenheimring_official

Lately, the Girls On Track Karting Challenge took place at @nuerburgring. In the @fia.official talents driver programme, girls with the age between 13 and 18 years compete in kart slalom and witness motorsport first hand. The challenge was accompanied by #DaretobeDifferent. #HWA supports the event as well and informed schoolgirls about racing participation as part of student internships or the Girls Day. #hwaag #motorsport #racing #affalterbach #TheGirlsOnTrack #FIAWomeninMotorsport#Kartslalom #D2BD #DrivingFemaleTalent #WomeninMotorsport #GTMasters #ADACGTMasters #Nrburgring #Motorsport #DMSJ #DMSB

#ThrowbackThursday #Norisring: @edomortara and @garypaffett accomplished the third 1-2 victory of the campaign and the 107th in the 30-year #DTM history. #Paffett leads the championship. #Mortara is second. @dani_juncadella secured his first pole and with third place his first podium finish in his @dtm_pics career on Sunday. Next up is Zandvoort, where the @mercedesamgdtm team will arrive as leader in all three championships.#hwa #hwaag #motorsport #racing #speed #mercedes #amg #MercedesAMG #engineering #affalterbach #hightech #challenge #team #mercedesbenz #sport #work #doublewin #victory #glory #podium #winner #welldone #perfectjob #engineeringspeed #tbt

Hard work paid off: After our 1-2 victory on Saturday we accomplished another double podium in the @dtm_pics at #Norisring on Sunday. @edomortara finished 2nd and @dani_juncadella secured 3rd place. 1-2 victory for the @mercedesamgdtm team! @edomortara wins his jubilee race and @garypaffett finishes 2nd. It was the 10th victory in @dtm_pics in the 100th race of Mortara. Paffett is leader in the overall standings again. What a first race at #Norisring. Besides, the winning car has the design of the @dfb_team. The highlight of the season is calling: The Nuremberg circuit and Mercedes  thats a very special story. For years, we dominated here and made the Norisring a fortress for our brand. In recent years, though, this dominance has unfortunately somewhat diminished. So, its all the more important for the team to be successful again here in our final year, Ulrich Fritz, Mercedes-AMG Motorsport DTM Teamchef and CEO HWA AG.#hwa #hwaag #motorsport #racing #speed #mercedes #amg #MercedesAMG #teamspirit #teamwork #engineering #affalterbach #hightech #challenge #team #mercedesbenz #sport #work #dtm #norisring

Fit and ready: HWA and the @mercedesamgdtm team are looking forward to the highlight of the @dtm_pics season. @edomortara, @paul_diresta, @garypaffett, @pascal_wehrlein, @dani_juncadella und @luggiauer want to continue the success story of Mercedes-AMG Motorsport at the @Norisring. Since 2000, Mercedes-AMG Motorsport have won 15 races in Nuremberg. Good luck guys!#hwa #hwaag #motorsport #racing #speed #mercedes #amg #MercedesAMG #teamspirit #teamwork #engineering #affalterbach #hightech #challenge #team #mercedesbenz #sport #work #dtm #norisring

BREAKING NEWS: @apollo_automobil partners with HWA AG for the final dynamic development of the #ApolloIE. The partnership gives #Apollo access to HWAs globally renowned engineering expertise, technologies and world-class facilities.
